title: Peak Index in a Mountain Array - Array - Easy - LeetCode
content:
Let's call an array arr a mountain if the following properties hold: arr.length >= 3
There exists some i with 0 < i < arr.length - 1 such that:
arr[0] < arr[1] < ... arr[i-1] < arr[i]
arr[i] > arr[i+1] > ... > arr[arr.length - 1]

title: Range Sum Query - Immutable - Array - Easy - LeetCode
content:
Given an integer array nums, find the sum of the elements between indices i and j (i ≤ j), inclusive. Example: Given nums = [-2, 0, 3, -5, 2, -1] sumRange(0, 2) -> 1
sumRange(2, 5) -> -1
sumRange(0, 5) -> -3

title: Binary Watch - Immutable - Array - Easy - LeetCode
content:
A binary watch has 4 LEDs on the top which represent the hours (0-11), and the 6 LEDs on the bottom represent the minutes (0-59). Each LED represents a zero or one, with the least significant bit on the right.

title: Implement Stack using Queues - Stack - Easy - LeetCode
Implement Queue using Stacks - Stack - Easy - LeetCode
content:
Implement the following operations of a queue using stacks. push(x) -- Push element x to the back of the queue.
pop() -- Removes the element from in front of the queue.
peek() -- Get the front element.
empty() -- Return whether the queue is empty.

content:

title: Remove Outermost Parentheses - Stacks - Easy - LeetCode
content:

content:
